select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, form_no, dept_id, dept_name, stamp_type, majors, use_time, doc_type, use_stamp, use_description, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, plot_ids from five_ed_stamp
